pageContext.claim: “In 2016, the ABC News/Washington Post Poll was such a complete disaster that these two Fake News Organizations changed the numbers prior to the Election. Now these haters are trying the same thing, though on a lesser scale, again. Will have a bigger win than even 2016!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump has falsely suggested that the ABC-Washington Post was changed in 2016 to make the race closer after his lawyers complained. The poll was a daily tracking poll, and the final estimate showed Clinton with a statistically insignificant 3-4 point lead, with the margin depending on whether third-party candidates were named. The tracking poll started with a 12-point gap when it was not yet a joint ABC-Washington Post project.
